testcase.name: invalidEvent_isReroutedToDLQ_withReasonHeader

failure.message: Expecting actual: "Listener method could not be invoked with the incoming message Endpoint handler details: Method [public void org.example.tests.TestApp$OrderService.onOrder(org.example.avro.v2.OrderCreated)] Bean [org.example.tests.TestApp$OrderService@65294247]; Cannot handle message" to contain: "negative total"
